data_table.description: Annual Follow-up Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID

variable.name: AFUcomp2_A
variable.description: A. Vital Status. FINAL STATUS Q2 IN AFUA-M; Q1 IN AFU V1-V3, SAF1 V1-V3 [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, Version A]
